---
Title: 'User guide'
---

With the **HydroMT plugin UWBM plugin**, users can easily benefit from the rich set of tools of the
[HydroMT package](https://deltares.github.io/hydromt/latest/index.html) to build and update
uwbm models from available global and local data.

This plugin assists the uwbm modeller in:

- Quickly setting up a base uwbm model and default parameter values
- Making maximum use of the best available global or local data
- Adjusting and updating components of a uwbm model and their associated parameters in a consistent way

One uwbm Model classes is currently available:

- ``uwbm`` (VectorModel): class for the uwbm model.
